languages.text: "Что ж. Заседание подходит к концу". {n}Префект обводит взглядом собранных в зале дворян Даргонуса.{/n} "Свод прегрешений и ересей, что был представлен на суд слугам Бога-Императора, явил истинную сущность Вольного Торговца, и выводы неутешительны. Ибо помыслы и деяния {mf|его|ее} были нацелены не на служение Человечеству, но на потакание собственной алчности и мелочным амбициям. Сегодня вы здесь, дабы засвидетельствовать акт праведного суда и падение династии фон Валанциус. Роды Даргонуса, отвергаете ли вы власть ерети{mf|ка|чки}?"

traits.locale_text: "Что ж. Заседание подходит к концу". {n}Префект обводит взглядом собранных в зале дворян Даргонуса.{/n} "Собрание прегрешений и ересей, что было представлено на суд слугам Бога-Императора, раз и навсегда заклеймило Вольного Торговца как исчадие, всеми деяниями своими стремившееся к удовлетворению мелочных и гнусных стремлений, а не истинному служению Ему. Сегодня вы здесь, чтобы засвидетельствовать падение династии фон Валанциус и долгожданное наказание, что обрушится на него уже сегодня. Роды Даргонуса, отвергаете ли вы власть ерети{mf|ка|чки}?"

"Что ж. Заседание подходит к концу". {n}Префект обводит взглядом собранных в зале дворян Даргонуса.{/n} "Свод прегрешений и ересей, что был представлен на суд слугам Бога-Императора, явил истинную сущность Вольного Торговца, и выводы неутешительны. Ибо помыслы и деяния {mf|его|ее} были нацелены не на служение Человечеству, но на потакание собственной алчности и мелочным амбициям. Сегодня вы здесь, дабы засвидетельствовать акт праведного суда и падение династии фон Валанциус. Роды Даргонуса, отвергаете ли вы власть ерети{mf|ка|чки}?"

languages.text: "Well. The proceedings are nearing their conclusion." {n}The prefect looks around at the nobles of Dargonus gathered in the hall.{/n} "The record of sins and heresies presented to the servants of the God-Emperor has revealed the Rogue Trader's true essence, and the verdict is grim. For {mf|his|her} thoughts and deeds were not bent toward the service of Humanity, but to the indulgence of {mf|his|her} own greed and petty ambition. Today, you are here to witness an act of righteous judgement, and the downfall of the von Valancius dynasty. Houses of Dargonus, do you reject the authority of this heretic?"
languages.original_text: "Что ж. Заседание подходит к концу". {n}Префект обводит взглядом собранных в зале дворян Даргонуса.{/n} "Свод прегрешений и ересей, что был представлен на суд слугам Бога-Императора, явил истинную сущность Вольного Торговца, и выводы неутешительны. Ибо помыслы и деяния {mf|его|ее} были нацелены не на служение Человечеству, но на потакание собственной алчности и мелочным амбициям. Сегодня вы здесь, дабы засвидетельствовать акт праведного суда и падение династии фон Валанциус. Роды Даргонуса, отвергаете ли вы власть ерети{mf|ка|чки}?"

traits.locale_text: "Well. The proceedings are nearing their conclusion." {n}The prefect looks around at the nobles of Dargonus gathered in the hall.{/n} "The record of sins and heresies presented to the servants of the God-Emperor has revealed the Rogue Trader's true essence, and the verdict is grim. For {mf|his|her} thoughts and deeds were not bent to the service of Humanity, but to the indulgence of {mf|his|her} own greed and petty ambition. Today, you are here to witness the act of righteous judgement and the downfall of the von Valancius dynasty. Houses of Dargonus, do you reject the authority of this heretic?"

"Well. The proceedings are nearing their conclusion." {n}The prefect looks around at the nobles of Dargonus gathered in the hall.{/n} "The record of sins and heresies presented to the servants of the God-Emperor has revealed the Rogue Trader's true essence, and the verdict is grim. For {mf|his|her} thoughts and deeds were not bent toward the service of Humanity, but to the indulgence of {mf|his|her} own greed and petty ambition. Today, you are here to witness an act of righteous judgement, and the downfall of the von Valancius dynasty. Houses of Dargonus, do you reject the authority of this heretic?"

"Well. The proceedings are nearing their conclusion." {n}The prefect looks around at the nobles of Dargonus gathered in the hall.{/n} "The collection of transgressions and heresies that has been brought before this court of the God-Emperor's servants has once and for all branded the Rogue Trader an abomination, who through all {mf|his|her} deeds has sought to satisfy {mf|his|her} petty and base desires rather than truly serve Him. You are here today to witness the fall of the von Valancius dynasty and the long-awaited punishment that will be served upon it. Houses of Dargonus, do you reject the authority of this heretic?"

"Well. The proceedings are nearing their conclusion." {n}The prefect looks around at the nobles of Dargonus gathered in the hall.{/n} "The collection of transgressions and heresies that has been brought before this court of the God-Emperor's servants has once and for all branded the Rogue Trader an abomination, who through all {mf|his|her} deeds has sought to satisfy {mf|his|her} petty and base desires rather than truly serve Him. You are here today to witness the fall of the von Valancius dynasty and the long-awaited punishment that will be served upon it. Houses of Dargonus, do you reject the authority of this heretic?"

The proceedings are nearing their conclusion." {n}The prefect looks around at the nobles of Dargonus gathered in the hall.{/n} "The record of sins and heresies presented to the servants of the God-Emperor has revealed the Rogue Trader's true essence, and the verdict is grim. For {mf|his|her} thoughts and deeds were not bent toward the service of Humanity, but to the indulgence of {mf|his|her} own greed and petty ambition. Today, you are here to witness an act of righteous judgement, and the downfall of the von Valancius dynasty. Houses of Dargonus, do you reject the authority of this heretic?"

languages.text: "Gut. Das Verfahren nähert sich seinem Ende." {n}Die Präfektin lässt ihren Blick über die im Saal versammelten Adeligen von Dargonus schweifen.{/n} "Die den Dienern des Gottimperators vorgelegte Auflistung von Sünden und Ketzereien hat das wahre Wesen {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} gezeigt und das Urteil ist streng. {mf|Seine|Ihre} Gedanken und Taten standen nicht im Dienst der Menschheit, sondern dienten der Befriedigung {mf|seiner|ihrer} eigenen Habgier und der Erreichung niederer Ziele. Wir sind heute hier, um Zeugen eines rechtmäßigen Urteils und des Niedergangs der Dynastie derer von Valancius zu werden. Häuser von Dargonus, entsagt Ihr der Autorität {mf|dieses Ketzers|dieser Ketzerin}?"
languages.original_text: "Well. The proceedings are nearing their conclusion." {n}The prefect looks around at the nobles of Dargonus gathered in the hall.{/n} "The record of sins and heresies presented to the servants of the God-Emperor has revealed the Rogue Trader's true essence, and the verdict is grim. For {mf|his|her} thoughts and deeds were not bent toward the service of Humanity, but to the indulgence of {mf|his|her} own greed and petty ambition. Today, you are here to witness an act of righteous judgement, and the downfall of the von Valancius dynasty. Houses of Dargonus, do you reject the authority of this heretic?"

traits.locale_text: "Gut. Das Verfahren nähert sich seinem Ende." {n}Die Präfektin lässt ihren Blick über die im Saal versammelten Adeligen von Dargonus schweifen.{/n} "Die den Dienern des Gottimperators vorgelegte Auflistung von Sünden und Ketzereien hat das wahre Wesen {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} gezeigt und das Urteil ist streng. {mf|Seine|Ihre} Gedanken und Taten standen nicht im Dienst der Menschheit, sondern dienten der Befriedigung {mf|seiner|ihrer} eigenen Habgier und der Erreichung niederer Ziele. Wir sind heute hier, um Zeugen eines rechtmäßigen Urteils und des Niedergangs der Dynastie derer von Valancius zu werden. Häuser von Dargonus, entsagt Ihr der Autorität {mf|dieses Ketzers|dieser Ketzerin}?"

languages.text: « Bien. Les débats touchent à leur fin. » {n}La préfète balaie du regard les nobles de Dargonus rassemblés dans la salle.{/n} « Le récit des péchés et hérésies présenté à cette cour de serviteurs de l'Empereur-Dieu a mis en lumière la véritable nature {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, et le verdict est sombre. Car ses pensées et ses actes n'étaient pas tournés vers le bien de l'humanité, mais motivés par sa propre avarice et son ambition mesquine. Vous êtes rassemblés ici aujourd'hui pour être témoins d'un acte de justice vertueux et de la chute de la dynastie von Valancius. Maisons de Dargonus, rejetez-vous l'autorité de {mf|cet|cette} hérétique ? »
languages.original_text: "Well. The proceedings are nearing their conclusion." {n}The prefect looks around at the nobles of Dargonus gathered in the hall.{/n} "The record of sins and heresies presented to the servants of the God-Emperor has revealed the Rogue Trader's true essence, and the verdict is grim. For {mf|his|her} thoughts and deeds were not bent toward the service of Humanity, but to the indulgence of {mf|his|her} own greed and petty ambition. Today, you are here to witness an act of righteous judgement, and the downfall of the von Valancius dynasty. Houses of Dargonus, do you reject the authority of this heretic?"

traits.locale_text: « Bien. Les débats touchent à leur fin. » {n}La préfète balaie du regard les nobles de Dargonus rassemblés dans la salle.{/n} « Le récit des péchés et hérésies présenté à cette cour de serviteurs de l'Empereur-Dieu a mis en lumière la véritable nature {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, et le verdict est sombre. Car ses pensées et ses actes n'étaient pas tournés vers le bien de l'humanité, mais motivés par sa propre avarice et son ambition mesquine. Vous êtes rassemblés ici aujourd'hui pour être témoins d'un acte de justice vertueux et de la chute de la dynastie von Valancius. Maisons de Dargonus, rejetez-vous l'autorité de {mf|cet|cette} hérétique ? »

languages.text: “既然如此，诉讼程序即将结束。”{n}行政官环顾了一眼聚集在大厅里的达戈努斯贵族。{/n}“本法庭在神皇众多仆人面前，揭露了行商浪人犯下的罪行与异端恶行，也揭露了{mf|他|她}的堕落本质。本法庭即将传达严厉判决，行商浪人的所作所为并不是为了全体人类的利益，而是为了放纵{mf|他|她}本人的贪婪与狭隘的野心。今天，你们将会亲眼见证这场正义的审判，见证冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的覆灭。达戈努斯的全体贵族，你们是否愿意推翻这个异端分子的暴政？”
languages.original_text: "Well. The proceedings are nearing their conclusion." {n}The prefect looks around at the nobles of Dargonus gathered in the hall.{/n} "The record of sins and heresies presented to the servants of the God-Emperor has revealed the Rogue Trader's true essence, and the verdict is grim. For {mf|his|her} thoughts and deeds were not bent toward the service of Humanity, but to the indulgence of {mf|his|her} own greed and petty ambition. Today, you are here to witness an act of righteous judgement, and the downfall of the von Valancius dynasty. Houses of Dargonus, do you reject the authority of this heretic?"

traits.locale_text: “既然如此，诉讼程序即将结束。”{n}行政官环顾了一眼聚集在大厅里的达戈努斯贵族。{/n}“本法庭在神皇众多仆人面前，揭露了行商浪人犯下的罪行与异端恶行，也揭露了{mf|他|她}的堕落本质。本法庭即将传达严厉判决，行商浪人的所作所为并不是为了全体人类的利益，而是为了放纵{mf|他|她}本人的贪婪与狭隘的野心。今天，你们将会亲眼见证这场正义的审判，见证冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的覆灭。达戈努斯的全体贵族，你们是否愿意推翻这个异端分子的暴政？”

languages.text: «Bueno, el proceso se acerca a su fin». {n}La prefecta observa a los nobles de Dargonus reunidos en la sala.{/n} «La serie de transgresiones y herejías que se ha relatado en este tribunal de los sirvientes del Dios Emperador ha revelado la esencia de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, y el veredicto es grave. Sus pensamientos no iban dirigidos hacia el beneficio de la Humanidad, sino que buscaban satisfacer sus deseos mezquinos y vulgares. Están todos aquí para presenciar el justo castigo y la caída de la dinastía von Valancius. Casas de Dargonus, ¿rechazan la autoridad de est{mf|e|a} hereje?».
languages.original_text: "Well. The proceedings are nearing their conclusion." {n}The prefect looks around at the nobles of Dargonus gathered in the hall.{/n} "The record of sins and heresies presented to the servants of the God-Emperor has revealed the Rogue Trader's true essence, and the verdict is grim. For {mf|his|her} thoughts and deeds were not bent toward the service of Humanity, but to the indulgence of {mf|his|her} own greed and petty ambition. Today, you are here to witness an act of righteous judgement, and the downfall of the von Valancius dynasty. Houses of Dargonus, do you reject the authority of this heretic?"

traits.locale_text: «Bueno, el proceso se acerca a su fin». {n}La prefecta observa a los nobles de Dargonus reunidos en la sala.{/n} «La serie de transgresiones y herejías que se ha relatado en este tribunal de los sirvientes del Dios Emperador ha revelado la esencia de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, y el veredicto es grave. Sus pensamientos no iban dirigidos hacia el beneficio de la Humanidad, sino que buscaban satisfacer sus deseos mezquinos y vulgares. Están todos aquí para presenciar el justo castigo y la caída de la dinastía von Valancius. Casas de Dargonus, ¿rechazan la autoridad de est{mf|e|a} hereje?».

languages.text: 「さて…審理もいよいよ終盤に差し掛かりました」{n}ダルゴナスの貴族たちが集うホールを総監は見回した。{/n}「この神帝陛下の従者たる法廷において提示された数々の罪状と異端行為の数々は、ローグトレーダーを完全に冒涜者として刻みつけるに至りました。その所業のすべては、陛下に仕えることなく、卑小で低俗な欲望を満たすために行われたのです。皆さんにここにお集まりいただいたのは、フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の没落と、その血筋に科されるべき宿願の罰を見届けていただくためです。ダルゴナスの貴族の方々よ、この異端者の権威を否認しますか？」
languages.original_text: "Well. The proceedings are nearing their conclusion." {n}The prefect looks around at the nobles of Dargonus gathered in the hall.{/n} "The collection of transgressions and heresies that has been brought before this court of the God-Emperor's servants has once and for all branded the Rogue Trader an abomination, who through all {mf|his|her} deeds has sought to satisfy {mf|his|her} petty and base desires rather than truly serve Him. You are here today to witness the fall of the von Valancius dynasty and the long-awaited punishment that will be served upon it. Houses of Dargonus, do you reject the authority of this heretic?"

traits.locale_text: 「さて…審理もいよいよ終盤に差し掛かりました」{n}ダルゴナスの貴族たちが集うホールを総監は見回した。{/n}「この神帝陛下の従者たる法廷において提示された数々の罪状と異端行為の数々は、ローグトレーダーを完全に冒涜者として刻みつけるに至りました。その所業のすべては、陛下に仕えることなく、卑小で低俗な欲望を満たすために行われたのです。皆さんにここにお集まりいただいたのは、フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の没落と、その血筋に科されるべき宿願の罰を見届けていただくためです。ダルゴナスの貴族の方々よ、この異端者の権威を否認しますか？」

languages.text: "Evet, artık duruşmayı neticelendiriyoruz." {n}Prefekt, salonda toplanmış Dargonus soylularına bakınıyor.{/n} Tanrı İmparator'un hizmetkârlarına sunulan günah ve kâfirlik kayıtları, Hür Tacir'in gerçek yüzünü ortaya çıkardı. Neticede acımasız bir karar verildi. Zira kendisinin düşünce ve eylemleri; insanlığa hizmete değil, kendi açgözlülüğüne ve küçük hırslarına hizmete yöneliktir. Bugün adil yargılamaya ve von Valancius hanedanlığının çöküşüne tanık olmak üzere buradasınız. Dargonus Haneleri... Bu kâfirin otoritesini reddediyor musunuz?"
languages.original_text: "Well. The proceedings are nearing their conclusion." {n}The prefect looks around at the nobles of Dargonus gathered in the hall.{/n} "The record of sins and heresies presented to the servants of the God-Emperor has revealed the Rogue Trader's true essence, and the verdict is grim. For {mf|his|her} thoughts and deeds were not bent toward the service of Humanity, but to the indulgence of {mf|his|her} own greed and petty ambition. Today, you are here to witness an act of righteous judgement, and the downfall of the von Valancius dynasty. Houses of Dargonus, do you reject the authority of this heretic?"

traits.locale_text: "Evet, artık duruşmayı neticelendiriyoruz." {n}Prefekt, salonda toplanmış Dargonus soylularına bakınıyor.{/n} Tanrı İmparator'un hizmetkârlarına sunulan günah ve kâfirlik kayıtları, Hür Tacir'in gerçek yüzünü ortaya çıkardı. Neticede acımasız bir karar verildi. Zira kendisinin düşünce ve eylemleri; insanlığa hizmete değil, kendi açgözlülüğüne ve küçük hırslarına hizmete yöneliktir. Bugün adil yargılamaya ve von Valancius hanedanlığının çöküşüne tanık olmak üzere buradasınız. Dargonus Haneleri... Bu kâfirin otoritesini reddediyor musunuz?"
